parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Containers

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Add magazines to the cargo space of vehicles, which can be taken out by infantry units. Once the magazine cargo space is filled up, any further addMagazineCargo commands are ignored.
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>In Arma 3, arguments for this command must be local (<template><title>Icon</title><part><name index="1"/><value>localArgument</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>32</value></part></template>). For global variant see [[addMagazineCargoGlobal]].</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> vehicleName [[addMagazineCargo]] [magazineName, count]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vehicleName: [[Object]] - vehicle to add the magazines to

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [magazineName, count]: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> magazineName: [[String]] - magazine name. See [[:Category:Weapons]] for reference about possible values.

</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> count: [[Number]] - number of magazines to add

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_truck [[addMagazineCargo]] ["M16", 5];</code>
 
</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[addMagazineCargoGlobal]], [[addMagazine]], [[addMagazineGlobal]], [[addMagazines]], [[addMagazinePool]], [[addMagazineTurret]], [[clearMagazineCargo]], [[addWeaponCargo]], [[clearWeaponCargo]], [[getMagazineCargo]], [[addItemCargo]], [[addItemCargoGlobal]], [[addMagazineAmmoCargo]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment><dd class="notedate">Posted on October 24, 2009 - 11:02,  (CEST)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Sbsmac|Sbsmac]]</dt>
<dd class="note"> Only works on clients.
<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
